snippet: A ban on abortion at the 12th week of pregnancy is likely to be declared unconstitutional, a federal district judge said.
abstract: Federal Judge Susan Webber Wright temporarily blocks enforcement of Arkansas ban on abortion at 12th week of pregnancy, one of country's most stringent abortion laws, saying law is likely to be declared unconstitutional.
lead_paragraph: A ban on abortion at the 12th week of pregnancy is likely to be declared unconstitutional, a federal district judge said.

headline.main: Abortion Law in Arkansas Is Blocked by U.S. Judge
headline.print_headline: Abortion Law In Arkansas Is Blocked By U.S. Judge
